 * transcription-coupled repair of oxidative DNA damage: This is not a disease itself, but a cellular process that helps repair damaged DNA. Defects in this process can lead to an increased risk of diseases, particularly cancers.
 * hypersensitive to ionizing radiation: This is not a disease itself, but a condition that can make an individual more susceptible to the harmful effects of ionizing radiation. This condition can be a symptom or complication of certain diseases, particularly cancers.
 * hypersensitive to hydrogen peroxide: This is not a disease itself, but a condition that can make an individual more susceptible to the harmful effects of hydrogen peroxide. This condition can be a symptom or complication of certain diseases, particularly cancers.
